hadiths.text: It was narrated from Talhah bin ‘Ubaidullah that the Prophet (ﷺ) gave him some wild donkey meat, and told him to distribute it among his Companions, who were in Ihram

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي ذَلِكَ إِذَا لَمْ يُصَدْ لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: Permitting that when it is not hunted for the one who accepts it
